name: Trickshot League: AR Game
description:
Trick Shot Game featuring everything from an augmented reality multiplayer trick shot battle for points and prestige, to an adventure mode filled with brain teasing, immersive puzzles designed to strengthen your mind and trickshot skills. You can even create your own custom trick shots in Playground Mode using our ever growing library of virtual objects and even use real life objects in augmented reality!

Dude - This is the Perfect strategy game to provide get up and move fun for the whole family!

• MULTIPLAYER / BATTLE ROYALE: Play against your friends and the world in multiplayer mode. Run around the immersive arena and make the most baskets to win the game. Just watch out for other players trying to stop you. You get hit and you lose the ability to shoot! *Best played outdoors with a lot of room.

• ADVENTURE: Numerous, pre-made stages to build and test your Trickshot skills while earning awesome loot like limited edition throwables and some serious coinage!

A great place to start Trickshot League is Adventure Mode. Stages start off simple to teach you the basics of the game, while further levels not only test your trickshot skills, but your brain as well. It is a great mode to hone your trickshot skills and get inspiration for the Playground.

• PLAYGROUND: Use our library of fun targets, obstacles and throwables to create and make awesome Trickshots. You can even use real life objects as obstacles.

https://www.facebook.com/trickshotleagueHave you ever wanted to throw a basketball into a goal from 100 feet, or bounce a ping pong ball across the room into a plastic cup? Or maybe you saw that YouTube video of some amazing Trickshot that you want to recreate. Trickshot League Playground Mode lets you do all that and more, right from your phone. Your only limit is your imagination!
